Translations.Text: DI ADVOKAT justice charity RELATIV. Li forbids evil vice transgression. Li enlightens vi ke vi pren heed
(Vi fulfill your covenant DI when vi far such covenant Vi ne violate oaths jxur Di) port them vi far DI guarantor vi! DI kon CXIO VI do

Ne est knitter unravels her fort trik into piles flimsy yarn This est your ekzempl vi abuse oaths sorb avantagx da unu another 1 grup est larger than ali DI tiel puts vi test Li surely montr vi Tag Resurrection cxio vi disput
Hav DI willed Li far vi 1 congregation! Li send astray whoever chooses ir astray Li direkt whoever wishes direkt! Vi surely est pet pri cxio vi done
(Ne abuse oaths vi lest vi slide dors hav fort foothold tiam vi incur mizer! Such est consequence de repelling el path DI setting mav ekzempl;) vi incur terrible retribution
Ne vend your oaths short DI! Ki DI posed est far put vi se vi nur kon
ki vi posed kur out ki DI posed last forever Ni surely rekompenc those who steadfastly persevere ni recompense them their righteous works
Anyone works righteousness vir female while kred ni surely grant them felicx life en this mond ni surely pag them their plen recompense Tag Judgment their righteous works
When vi leg Quran vi streb rifugx DI el Satan des rejected
Li ne hav potenc over those kred fid their Lord
His potenc lim those choose him as their mastr those who choose him their di
